S04n352:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena tridaśendrabhavanaṃ yena ca surendrābhā devakanyā smṛtimato devaputrasya duhitā,
S04n352:3: upetya surendrābhāyā devakanyāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya surendrābhāṃ devakanyāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya surendrābhāyā devakanyāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitva evamāha-mayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam |
S04n352:4: na ca jānāmi-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n352:6: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti |
S04n352:7: tadvadasva me devate kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n352:9: evamukte surendrābhā nāma devakanyā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat-ahaṃ kulaputra asaṅgasmṛtiviśuddhavyūhasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī |
S04n352:10: sā ahaṃ kulaputra abhijānāmi-utpalako nāma kalpo'bhūt |
S04n352:15: yaśca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvabhūtairmātuḥ kukṣigatairjāyamānaiḥ sapta padāni prakrāmadbhirmahāsiṃhanādaṃ nadadbhiḥ kumārabhūmisthitairantaḥpuramadhyagatairvā abhiniṣkrāmadbhirvā bodhimabhisaṃbudhyamānairvā dharmacakraṃ pravartayamānaiḥ sarvabuddhavikurvitaṃ vā saṃdarśayadbhiḥ sattvaparipākavinayaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04n352:16: tatsarvaṃ prathamacittotpādāya yāvatsaddharmaparyantaniṣṭhaṃ prajānāmi smarāmi anusmarāmi dhārayāmi saṃdhārayāmi upadhārayāmi anusarāmi |
S04n352:19: subhago nāma kalpo'bhūttatra me buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ |
S04n352:22: suprabho nāma kalpo'bhūt tatra me jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ |
S04n352:33: iti hi kulaputra anenopāyena gaṅgānadīvālukāsamān kalpānanusmarāmi,
S04n352:35: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādayamasaṅgasmṛtiviśuddhavyūho bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ śrutaḥ |
S04n352:36: śrutvā ca ārāgitaḥ yathoktaṃ ca pratipannaḥ |
S04n352:37: evaṃ cāhaṃ vimokṣaṃ satatasamitamanupraviṣṭā yacca teṣāṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya yāvatsaddharmasthitiparyantaniṣṭhaṃ buddhavikurvitaṃ tatsarvamanena asaṅgasmṛtiviśuddhavyūhena bodhisattvavimokṣeṇānusmarāmi dhārayāmi saṃdhārayāmi upadhārayāmi anusmarāmi |
S04n352:39: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vigatatamondhakārāṇāṃ saṃsārarātriprabhāvitānāṃ vigatanivaraṇānāmanidrāgamānāṃ vigatastyānamiddhānāṃ prasrabdhakāyasaṃskārāṇāṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvānubodhasuviśuddhānāṃ daśabalaviśuddhibodhayitṝṇāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum ||
S04n352:41: kapilavastuni mahānagare viśvāmitro nāma dārakācāryaḥ prativasati |
S04n352:44: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ prītisaumanasyajāto'cintyakuśalamūlavegasaṃvardhitaḥ surendrābhāyā devakanyāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya surendrābhāṃ devakanyāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya surendrābhāyā devakanyāyā antikātprakrāntaḥ ||43 ||
